00020   Supported Boards:
00021             TouchShield Slide : http://www.liquidware.com/shop/show/TSL/TouchShield+Slide
00022             TouchShield Stealth : http://www.liquidware.com/shop/show/TS/TouchShield+Stealth

00027   Usage:
00028     //Arduino Sketch Example (This guy is broadcasting the sensor)
00029 
00030         void setup() {
00031             Sensor.begin(19200);
00032         }
00033 
00034         void loop() {
00035             int value = analogRead(5);
00036             Sensor.print("accel", value);
00037         }
00038 
00039     //-- snip, new sketch -- //
00040 
00041     //TouchShield Sketch Example (This guy is reading the sensor)
00042 
00043         void setup() {
00044             Sensor.begin(19200);
00045             background(0);
00046         }
00047 
00048         void loop() {
00049             if (Sensor.available()) {
00050                 int value;
00051 
00052                 value = Sensor.read();  //get the sensor value
00053                 text(value, 50, 10);             // print the value to the screen
00054                 text(Sensor.getName(), 10, 10);  // print the name to the screen
00055             }
00056         }
00057 */
00058 
00059 #ifndef HardwareSensor_h
00060 #define HardwareSensor_h
00061 
00062 #include <inttypes.h>
00063 
00064 #define MAX_NAME_LEN    10    // the max name length
00065 #define MAX_MSG_LEN     32    // the max possible buffer length
00066 
00067 class HardwareSensor
00068 {
00069 
00070     private:
00071        char msgBuff[MAX_MSG_LEN];           // storage
00072        char* msg;                           // a pointer to the sensor message
00073        char* name;                          // a pointer to the message name
00074        int printDelay;                      // the delay between sensor printing
00075        int value;                           // the value of the sensor
00076 
00077        char*   Scan(char * buff, int maxLen);
00078        int     GetValue(char * sensorMsg);
00079        uint8_t Available(char * sensorMsg, char * sensorTarget);
00080        char*   GetName(char * sensorMsg);
00081 
00082     public:
00083        HardwareSensor(void);    //constructor
00084 
00085        uint8_t  available(void);
00086        int      read(void);                                 // read the integer value of the sensor
00087        void     print(char * sensorName, int sensorValue);  // print(sensorName, sensorValue) :: prints the sensor to the serial port
00088        char*    getName(void);                              // return the name of the available sensor
00089        int      getValue(void);                             // alias to Sensor.read()
00090        void     setPrintDelay(int);                         // the delay after Sensor.print()
00091        void     begin(long);                                // alias to Serial.begin()
00092 };
00093 
00094 extern HardwareSensor Sensor;
00095 
00096 #endif
